home.title: Software Developer
home.about: Hi! I'm Carlos, a software developer with over 2 years of experience. In 2022, I completed my Advanced Technical Degree in DAM, and since then I've been dedicated to learning and improving my development skills. Check out my latest projects!

zaraChallenge.title: ZARA CHALLENGE
zaraChallenge.description: Online mobile phone store, with List, Detail, and Cart views with LocalStorage.

shoppingCart.title: Shopping Cart
shoppingCart.description: Shopping Cart created during Midudev course.

movieSearchEngine.title: Movie Search Engine
movieSearchEngine.description: Movie search engine built with React, connected to the OMDb API.

ticTacToe.title: Tic-Tac-Toe
ticTacToe.description: Project created for React practice based on the classic game Tic Tac Toe.

bbvaHome.title: BBVA Home
bbvaHome.description: Website created for the LitElement exercise, where we will see an example of the BBVA login window.

toDoList.title: ToDoList
toDoList.description: Classic TodoList created with React, where we will also save the data we have entered in LocalStorage.

gifsApp.title: GifsApp
gifsApp.description: Project carried out for React practice, in which we connect to the Giphy API and can search for all kinds of GIFs.

myProjects.lastDescription: You can see all my projects on my <0>GitHub</0> profile.

contact.description: You can contact me by sending an email to <1><0>carlosdanieltc@gmail.com</0></1> or through my social media accounts.
contact.lastMessage: I look forward to your message!
